price: (6) Indeed, We have adorned the nearest heaven with an adornment of stars
arabic: إِنَّا زَيَّنَّا ٱلسَّمَآءَ ٱلدُّنۡيَا بِزِينَةٍ ٱلۡكَوَاكِبِ

version.title: English Translation - Saheeh International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English - Saheeh International - Al-Muntada Al-Islami (Islamic Forum)

meta.transliteration: innā zayyannā al-samāa al-dun'yā bizīnatin al-kawākibi
